links.id: Link MVP Drill Rover to Rover
Link Super Truffle Hog to Truffle Hog

nodes.description:
• Start: Earth-like
  • Want to be near body of water (jump out with F; start jet pack ; HOLD SPACE to FLY!; TAP on/off X to level out
  • Go to your drop
nodes.name: Sunken Ship

nodes.description:
• This rover is designed to be the SIMPLEST, buildable forward/back drill rover
  • Main goal: be able to drill forward and back with a single drill
  • Crtical limitation: The medium cargo container(s) greatly limits ability to collect ores for processing
nodes.name: Minimum Viable Product - Drill Rover

nodes.description: These are general tips to consider when playing.
nodes.name: Pro Tips

nodes.description: • Jet Pack [X]: IF Upside down, then tap it (1 off-1 on) until you right yourself
nodes.name: Movement

nodes.description:
• Start: Earth-like
  • Want to be near body of water (jump out with F; start jet pack ; HOLD SPACE to FLY!; TAP on/off X to level out
  • Go to your drop
nodes.name: Machinery

nodes.description: • Attaching to a conveyor system, BEFORE a connector, with "Drain All" (applicable items + whitelist) will quickly empty a vehicle
nodes.name: Sorters

nodes.description:
• NEVER use 1x1 for "real" vehicles
  • Add Gyroscopes to have some ability to right-out a vehicle (if it flips) [50 grids!]
  • Consider "side spikes" (e.g., place two ramps back to back, beyond width of tires, to force rolling)
  • Control+G will put you into build mode (e.g., you can place/build INSIDE a vehicle, a welder can then construct the object)
nodes.name: Vehicles

nodes.description: 6-wheeled, ore-detecting rover made from the spare parts of first drop ship.
nodes.name: Ant-Tony

nodes.description: 6-wheeled, ore-detecting and drill rover made from the spare parts of first drop ship.
nodes.name: Rhino

nodes.description: 16-wheeled, ore-detecting rover made from the spare parts of first drop ship.
nodes.name: Hippo

nodes.description: 16-wheeled, ore-detecting rover made from the spare parts of first drop ship.
nodes.name: Super Hippo

nodes.description:
• a 6-wheel Rover
  • Leverages the "rotor bug" (i.e., attach a LARGE GRID Ore Detector to a Small Grid)
  • Add a connector to enable towing by Ant-Tony or Hippo Class Vehicles
nodes.name: Truffle Hog

nodes.description:
• An 8-wheel variant
  • Adds a survival kit
  • +a SECOND Large Cargo Container

This design can be built first up to the 6-wheel portion (i.e., with a projector), then be a simple mod to extend the default Truffle Hog design
nodes.name: Super Truffle Hog
